Description: Fragment of the body of a Clazomenian black figure painted pottery amphora. Parts of women dancers; lower part of figure standing to left.
Curator's comments: Part of same amphora as,though not joining, Pl. GB 590.3-4 (BM GR 1888,0208.113.b, 1888,0208.106.f-g). Perhaps from same pot as Pl. GB 590.1 (BM GR 1888,0208.73.a). The fragments from Tell Dafana seem to come from comparatively few pots, but such sherds as these do not allow convincing attribution.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (pl. GB 590 3-4)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 149)
